resources.string: The motion that was requested was not executed correctly. Try to do exactly those movements that are requested. Movements should be fluid and timely.
Select the country of registration of your document, which should be uploaded in the next step.
Submitted document must meet the following requirements:
Select the country of registration of your document, which will need to be photographed during the next step.
the image must be in color
all 4 corners of the document are fully visible
valid at the time of dispatch
no foreign objects: covers, fingers, paper clips, etc.
original (not a photocopy, not a photo)
Take a photo of a document
Photo of the first page / side of the document (with your photo)
Photo of the last page / side with your photo (if you have multiple photos in the document)
Full spread of the document with your photo
Check if all the data on the document was recognized correctly.
Front side of the ID card
Back side of the ID card
Make sure every photo taken is readable (all 4 corners of the document are visible, fingers are not obstructing the data)
Upload a photo of the document
How is the data in the document filled in?
Please, wait. The photo of your document is being loaded and processed. This may take from a few seconds to a minute.
Check the readability of the information in the photo. Make sure all 4 corners of the document are visible in the photo.
For some reason, we were unable to load the content of this page. Try reloading the page
Unfortunately, we were unable to verify your application: If you do not agree with this decision, please contact support.
Everything was completed correctly, send for verification
There are a lot of obstacles in the frame
Everything was completed correctly, send for verification
We didn\'t find a page with that address :(
The time to complete the movement has expired

string.name: no_time_correct_text
string.u: Everything was completed correctly, send for verification

resources.string: Upload a photo of the front spread (spread with your photo).
Unfortunately, this mobile OS is not supported. To successfully complete the verification procedure, we recommend that you copy the link below and continue on your personal computer
You did not have time to complete the correct movement. Try to strictly adhere to the instructions at the time of the verification. Try again.
Everything was completed correctly, send for verification
There could be several people in the frame, or foreign objects. When re-checking, try so that only your face is in the frame and you can see it as clearly as possible..
The face was not found in the frame. Try to focus the camera so that the face is in the center. Try again.

The camera was not found or you have denied access to it. If the camera works correctly, give access to it and try again. If the problem persists, try to copy the verification link and continue on a different device.
While all application data sent to our services is being processed, you may return to the partner service.
First, place your face in the center of the frame, then perform the requested movements.
movements should be clear and smooth
there should be no interference in the frame
find a place with good lighting (bright, but no bright lights)
fixed camera (try not to move the camera)
To proceed with verification, choose the provider from the list of available for your country.
To process photo documents and check the face for liveness, you must provide the requested permissions
Please make first photo of the document
Document compliance check failed. Please, download the correct document

string.name: doc_verif_continue_anyway
string.u: I am confident in my document, continue the verification process

resources.string: Some document fields are not properly filled or empty
There was an issue while uploading a video. Please check your internet connection and try again without moving an app to the background.
Please enter a valid surname in Cyrillic
Please enter a valid Latin surname
Please enter a valid name in Cyrillic
Please enter a valid Latin name
Please enter a valid series and document number
Try to move smoothly. Try again.
The test cannot be performed because it is too dark. Try again with good lighting.
Please enter a valid date of birth
Please enter a valid document expiration date
Turn your head to the left
Turn your head to the right
Verification failed. Contact support for details.
Verification failed. Contact support for details.
Verification failed. Contact support for details.
Verification failed. Contact support for details.
Verification failed. Contact support for details.
Take a photo of your passport
Take a photo of your foreign passport
Take a photo of your ID card
Follow the on-screen instructions to take a full-page photo of your passport (both pages visible)
Following the instructions on the screen, take a photo of a full-page spread of your passport (both pages are visible)
Follow the on-screen instructions to take a photo of the front and then the back of your ID card
Prepare your document and place it in the specified zone as in the example above.
Put the document in the specified zone for automatic reading
Place the front side of the document in the specified zone for automatic reading
Place the back side of the document in the specified zone for automatic reading
The time to take document photo(s) has expired
We could not find the document in the given zone. Make sure you have selected the correct document type and that it\'s clearly visible in the camera.
We were unable to do a full scan of the document. To continue, you need to take a photo manually.
Front side scanned successfully. Please turn over the document/page.
Please make all required photos of the document
Enter a valid expiration date of your document
Verification session expired. Please, try again.
We weren\'t able to locate your document
We could not find your document in time. Make sure you have selected the correct document type and that it is clearly visible on the camera.

If you have problems scanning a document, we advise you to pass verification on another device with a good camera. You can also try to take a manual photo of your document (without auto-detection of the framed document)
The document does not match the selected type. We recommend to re-upload the document.
Incorrect number of loaded images. Reload the document.
The uploaded photos of document are too large or have the wrong file type. Please, try again.
Another document has already been uploaded
There is no possibility to upload several documents within one verification. Continue checking the data on the previously uploaded document
Another document has already been uploaded
There is no possibility to upload several documents within one verification. Continue checking the data on the previously uploaded document
Document compliance check failed. Please, download the correct document
To pass verification, you must upload a photo of the original document
Please take a clear picture of the document to continue.
For some reason, we were unable to download the content of this page. Try reloading the page.
Please upload the original of your document
